Listen man, I really don't want to start a fight but come on! He is clearly new! How about post a link, and then say "in the future look back at previous posts to see if your question is answered." Still looking for working DEMV series rovers. does anybody have an update to make them work in .25?

Still looking for working DEMV series rovers. does anybody have an update to make them work in .25?

Most still work there some with bugs here and there but maybe if your looking for a rover mod check this one out http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94947-Exploration-Rover-System-by-A-S-E-T-%2810-10-14%29
The plugin that ran DEMVs has not, as of yet, updated to 0.25. If anyone has recompiled it for this version, I suppose I could give them a shot again.

The plugin that ran DEMVs has not, as of yet, updated to 0.25. If anyone has recompiled it for this version, I suppose I could give them a shot again.

Have you tried contacting CleverWalrus? I have an old version of the CleverBobCat plugin on my computer, but I'm not sure if it's for 0.23 or 0.24.
I do use the ASET rover, but I like the variety, and looks of the DEMV pack.
Where's the download links!?
Try here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products
They're not there. I wish I knew how to update mods myself...

They're not there. I wish I knew how to update mods myself...

Yes they all are. Check it more attentively. The large fonted DOWNLOAD is under every list of required mods.
Moderators should lock this thread
I meant for the rovers. The Pretorian and the others. The only version I can find for it is for 0.18
When will there be an download?
No idea pal. I wish I knew.

GUYS this thread is no longer used please use this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products The DEMV rovers are no longer supported they require the cleverBobcat DLL which is no longer supported by cleverwalrus so unless you compile it yourselves they are unusable you can get the source from here if you want to compile against the latest version http://cleverbobcat.codeplex.com/

Edited February 3, 2015 by Virtualgenius

I was able to update the DEMV Mk. 4! It works with 0.25.0, but I'm not sure about 0.90.0. But it's worth a try! The link is in my signature. |

V

(and yes, I did get permission from Bobcat)
where is the download?

where is the download?
GUYS this thread is no longer used please use this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products The DEMV rovers are no longer supported they require the cleverBobcat DLL which is no longer supported by cleverwalrus so unless you compile it yourselves they are unusable you can get the source from here if you want to compile against the latest version http://cleverbobcat.codeplex.com/

As development and support for this mod has moved on to a new thread, I'll be closing this one as it no longer serves a real purpose beyond historical interest. Have a nice day
